mapper.select: select comment_id, board_id, content, reg_date from comment where board_id = #{id} and c_depth = false order by reg_date desc, comment_id desc;
select comment_id, board_id, content, reg_date from comment where board_id = #{boardId} and c_depth = true and c_group = #{cGroup} order by reg_date desc, comment_id desc;
select count(comment_id) from comment where board_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into comment (board_id, content, c_depth, c_group) values (#{boardId}, #{content}, #{cDepth}, #{cGroup});
mapper.select: select count(comment_id) from comment where board_id = #{id} and c_depth = true and c_group = #{cGroup};
